column4: im running multi-boot ubuntu/Win7, i made win7 default from grub bootloader, and gave myself 1 second to chose ubuntu instead, and seemingly its a bug in grub cus no matter how much i spam the up-button, that 1 second goes down to 0 before grub responds, thus im unable to enter ubuntu.. ideas how i can fix it?
Dr_Willis/ActionParsnip: i would if i could... how can i do that from win7?
use your ubuntu install cd as a live cd and edit it from there
you'll have to mount your hard drive once you've booted up and then under that go to the boot/grub/ folder and look for a conf file.
